mapper.select: SELECT value,type FROM sys_resource t1,sys_role_resource t2 where t1.resource_id = t2.resource_id and t2.role_id= #{value} and t1.status=1 and t2.status=1
SELECT value FROM sys_resource where status = 1 and type = #{value}

select t1.resource_id,t1.resource_name,t1.value,t1.parent_id,t1.icon from sys_resource t1 left join sys_role_resource t2 on t1.resource_id = t2.resource_id left join sys_role t3 on t2.role_id = t3.role_id left join sys_user_role t4 on t3.role_id = t4.role_id where t4.user_id = #{value} and t1.type = 1 and t1.menu = 1 and t1.status = 1 and t1.parent_id = '0' order by t1.seqno

select t1.resource_id,t1.resource_name,t1.value,t1.parent_id,t1.icon from sys_resource t1 left join sys_role_resource t2 on t1.resource_id = t2.resource_id left join sys_role t3 on t2.role_id = t3.role_id left join sys_user_role t4 on t3.role_id = t4.role_id where t1.type = 1 and t1.menu = 1 and t1.status = 1 and t1.parent_id = #{arg1} and t4.user_id = #{arg0} order by t1.seqno
